snippet: The Mariners, who already have Oliver Perez in the bullpen, are close to signing Jason Bay, who lives in Seattle in the off-season.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Seattle Mariners are closing in on formal agreement with outfielder Jason Bay, whose disastrous career with New York Mets came to abrupt end in November; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Mariners, who already have Oliver Perez in the bullpen, are close to signing Jason Bay, who lives in Seattle in the off-season.

headline.seo: Jason Bay Close to Signing With Mariners
headline.main: Bay May Join Another Mets Castoff in Seattle
headline.print_headline: Bay May Join Another Mets Castoff in Seattle
